publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1711# Dennis Canavan: Delegations from The Scottish Parliament —That the Parliament agrees that any proposed delegation from the Parliament should be subject to approval by the Parliament, that all members of the Parliament be invited to apply for membership of any proposed delegation and that the membership of any proposed delegation should be subject to approval by the Parliament by means of an appropriate motion.
S1M-1711# Delegations from The Scottish Parliament (lodged on 2 March 2001) Dr Winnie Ewing*

S1M-1711# Dennis Canavan: Delegations from The Scottish Parliament —That the Parliament agrees that any proposed delegation from the Parliament should be subject to approval by the Parliament, that all members of the Parliament be invited to apply for membership of any proposed delegation and that the membership of any proposed delegation should be subject to approval by the Parliament by means of an appropriate motion. Supported by: Dr Winnie Ewing
S1M-1711# Delegations from The Scottish Parliament (lodged on 2 March 2001) Ben Wallace*

S1M-1711# Dennis Canavan: Delegations from The Scottish Parliament —That the Parliament agrees that any proposed delegation from the Parliament should be subject to approval by the Parliament, that all members of the Parliament be invited to apply for membership of any proposed delegation and that the membership of any proposed delegation should be subject to approval by the Parliament by means of an appropriate motion. Supported by: Dr Winnie Ewing, Ben Wallace

Supported by: Dr Winnie Ewing, Ben Wallace
